resources.string: Take control of your destiny or someone else will
As more I train, I get luckier
Live today while tomorrow doesn\'t come
If you don\'t like something, change it. If not, change your attitude
What doesn\'t kill me makes me stronger
If you want someone to trust, trust yourself
Teachers open the door, but you must enter by yourself
Imagine a new story for your life and believe in it
At the end of the day, we can take a lot longer than we think we can
Button to generate a motivatin phrase
Picture of a coach giving advices to his followers
